desc: Shop for organically grown, naturally extracted, delta 9 THC products in Texas. Our Original Formula is an MCT Oil blend with 2.5 milligrams of THC per serving. 100% legal and safe. Each batch of our 1:2:2 THC:CBD:CBC formula is 3rd party tested to confirm efficacy, purity and legality.

layout.text: MCT Oil sublingual with precisely 2.5 Milligrams of THC per serving. Blissfully balanced by 5 Milligrams of CBD and CBC for a calming, uplifting experience.
